name: Avoid Functions and Procedures having qualified variables having spaces in the name (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures having qualified variables with spaces in the name.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures having qualified variables with spaces in the name.

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Main Procedure, PL1 Function and PL1 Procedure full name
rationale: When coding such blanks in qualified variables like A.B (defined in a structure), no blank is allowed before or after the dot.
remediation: Remove the spaces from the name of the qualified variables.
total: Number of PL1 Main Procedures, PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures.
